name: Bloom:Math-ternal
description:
is a virtual reality game that aims to recreate the feeling of playing shooters on gaming machines.

The game features a revolver that holds four bullets, with the last bullet being more powerful.

Additionally in the game, there are two types of pickups: pink ones that introduce various effects, such as changing the speed of time or the size of opponents, and green ones that represent basic mathematical operations like subtraction or multiplication. For example, using the division modifier with the time change effect will slow down the time.

Controlls: 
- Trigger to shoot 
- Grip to activate effect (after collecting both types of pickups)
